00011         static double Str2Armor(char *buf, DWORD *specialFX) {
00012                 if(!buf) { return 0.0; }
00013                 if(strchr(buf, '%')) {
00014                         bool specialed = false;
00015                         if(strlen(buf) == 2) {
00016                                 switch(*buf) {
00017                                         case '0':
00018                                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_ForceFire;
00019                                         case '1':
00020                                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_Retaliate;
00021                                         case '2':
00022                                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_PassiveAcquire;
00023                                                 specialed = true;
00024                                                 break;
00025                                 }
00026                         }
00027                         if(!specialed) {
00028                                 *specialFX |= verses_ForceFire;
00029                                 *specialFX |= verses_Retaliate;
00030                                 *specialFX |= verses_PassiveAcquire;
00031                         }
00032                         return atoi(buf) * 0.01;
00033                 } else {
00034                         double vs = atof(buf);
00035                         bool specialed = false;
00036                         if(CLOSE_ENOUGH(vs, 0.02)) {
00037                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_PassiveAcquire;
00038                                 specialed = true;
00039                         }
00040                         if(CLOSE_ENOUGH(vs, 0.01)) {
00041                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_Retaliate;
00042                         }
00043                         if(CLOSE_ENOUGH(vs, 0.00)) {
00044                                 *specialFX &= ~verses_ForceFire;
00045                         }
00046                         if(!specialed) {
00047                                 *specialFX |= verses_ForceFire;
00048                                 *specialFX |= verses_Retaliate;
00049                                 *specialFX |= verses_PassiveAcquire;
00050                         }
00051                         return vs;
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 
00055         // OMG OPTIMIZED:
00056         // http://graphics.stanford.edu/~seander/bithacks.html#IntegerLog
00057         static int Int2Highest(DWORD v) {
00058                 register unsigned int r; // result of log2(v) will go here
00059                 register unsigned int shift;
00060 
00061                 r =     (v > 0xFFFF) << 4; v >>= r;
00062                 shift = (v > 0xFF  ) << 3; v >>= shift; r |= shift;
00063                 shift = (v > 0xF   ) << 2; v >>= shift; r |= shift;
00064                 shift = (v > 0x3   ) << 1; v >>= shift; r |= shift;
00065                                                         r |= (v >> 1);
00066 
00067                 return r;
00068         }
00069 
00070 };
